Params: {3: 'On the way to the bridge, you see Sophia staring off into space.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'It has to do with ACA intel.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Should those who have failed as sinners... be put to death?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I don't know if I should say anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: "If it's a touchy subject, forget it.", 3: '17', 4: 'I want to know.', 5: '17'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I think your opinion would be a valuable reference.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sophia hesitates for a moment, takes out a slightly wrinkled letter from her pocket, and hands it over.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "We haven't spoken in quite some time. How have you been recently? Will you come back with the next fuel shipment?"}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'Thanks to the efforts of the Forbidden Imperial Army, just yesterday, we finally disposed of all the explosives planted by the anti-royalists in the carriage.'}

{2: 'Letter', 3: 'Anti-royalist leader, "Ashlar", fled before the bodyguards came to the door, but we\'ve already confirmed his whereabouts. In fact, I was just reading the report submitted by the intelligence personnel.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "...We'll catch him any time now. But what's important now is: what do we do once we catch him?"}

{2: 'Letter', 3: 'Ashton, the leader of the Forbidden Army, wrote me a thick stack of charges suggesting that I expose him to the public, then execute him and his family according to the ancient justice system.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "But... I've been wondering if this is really the right thing to do?"}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'Maintain the status quo, kill those who oppose me, and live until I hand over the throne?'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: "Come to think of it, wouldn't I be following in the footsteps of my father? If one day I, or my heir, become like Ashlar, will someone right our wrongs?"}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'On that note, I think change is necessary.'}
{2: 'Letter', 3: 'So, my loyal bodyguard, please tell me: if you were me, what would you do with him and his family?'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I don't know how to respond... to Jamilah.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "But if he's executed, that'll cause trouble down the line.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I don't know why Jamilah would ask me this...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Someone in her position wouldn't need others to help her make such a decision.", 4: '1'}
{2: "At least that's how you feel right now.", 3: '56', 4: "You'll figure it out later.", 5: '56'}
